sentence.Network_en: It was a foretaste of things to come.
They were unaware that the street violence was just a foretaste of what was to come.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们没有意识到，这起街头暴力预示着未来大规模的暴力行为。

sentence.Network_en: Summer styles are often a foretaste of autumn fashion.
sentence.Network_cn: 夏装的款式常常是秋装的预兆.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 二、朝圣聚会:朝圣活动不应是纯个人的事,而是与从各地来的亯众相聚、共融的机会,大家一起共同赞颂天主,分享圣宴:天乡大家庭的预尝(foretaste).。三、满载而归.
...foreswipe reflection 来自前侧的岩丘表面多次反射foretaste 先尝forethought 预谋
The unusually warm spring day seemed a foretaste of summer ., 不寻常的温暖春日似乎像是夏天的先兆.
her caustic remark gave him a foretaste of her anger ., 她的刻薄话使他预感到她的愤怒.

RelatedPhrase.word: A specimen or foretaste of what is to come

list.key: A specimen or foretaste of what is to come
list.exp: 一些月球的标本被带了回来
list.abs: 我可以看该材料的样品吗? Some specimen of moon rocks were brought back.一些月球的标本被带了回来。 A specimen or foretaste of what is to come.样本或预示 I request a specimen of your hand of writ.

entry.def: If you describe an event as a foretaste of a future situation, you mean that it suggests to you what that future situation will be like.

example.ex: It was a foretaste of things to come...
This is but a foretaste of what the emerging technologies will enable us to do.
example.tran: 新科技将会给我们带来什么，这仅仅是一次初体验。

means.word_mean: 1. an early limited awareness of something yet to occur

auth_sentence.content: Read today, it seems a jovial foretaste of existentialism music-hall Beckett.
auth_sentence.res_content: Read today, it seems a jovial foretaste of existentialism music-hall Beckett.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Read today, it seems a jovial foretaste of existentialism music-hall Beckett.

auth_sentence.content: This volume...can offer only a foretaste of the riches that are promised when the whole project is complete.
auth_sentence.res_content: This volume...can offer only a foretaste of the riches that are promised when the whole project is complete.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This volume...can offer only a foretaste of the riches that are promised when the whole project is complete.

auth_sentence.content: Sakhalin may soon offer all of Russia a foretaste of what large-scale oil investment can mean.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sakhalin may soon offer all of Russia a foretaste of what large-scale oil investment can mean.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sakhalin may soon offer all of Russia a foretaste of what large-scale oil investment can mean.
